评论概述: pretty but a beast to adjust the band
评论详情: The watch itself met expectations - it's attractive, overall. The watch face is nice and the band is rather comfortable, the. metal just has a little bit more of that "yellow" color you get with cheaper gold, but I wasn't surprised considering the price tag. It doesn't look cheap, it just doesn't look expensive. The worst part is if you have to adjust the size by taking some links out - what a PAIN! I have tiny wrists, so I had to take a bunch out. Pros of removing links is you don't have to remove them one-at-a-time, you can remove a section of them based on where you choose to pull the pins. Cons are the double sided screws are in SO tightly, it actually was causing the screws provided to remove the link screws to unscrew (does that make sense?). I had to dig into my husband's tool chest to find a different tiny [flat head] screwdriver to accomplish the task; tools provided are cheap and the watch doesn't quite fit the height of the screw tool provided, which caused me to slip a few times and I gouged my thumb. :-/ So...watch itself is decent and I like it; I'll wear it a lot. If you have to resize the band, I'm sorry.
Love the watch! Had to take out 6/7 ish links to get it to fit which was kind of difficult. But.. love it otherwise. Great for stacking.

This watch is cute I guess but the was wrapped in the worst plastic I’ve ever experienced. Took me forever to get all the plastic off. And the clasp is impossibly hard to unclasp. Not the happiest. Update the watch has scratched up bad in the month I have had it. So yeah not worth it.
This is a beautiful watch. Quartz Wrist Watches made of Stainless Steel.  Gold Watch Luxury Bracelet Tools Included. Makes a great gift. I highly recommend.

I like the watch a lot! It’s very pretty and nice for everyday or events. My only complaint is the clasp. It was very difficult to open. I felt that I was going to break it. I didn’t need to remove any links, so not sure how difficult that process is. Would’ve gave 5 stars if it wasn’t for the difficult clasp.

评论概述: Beautiful look but terrible to assemble
评论详情: This watch is so sparkly and shiny. It really is a beautiful piece of jewelry. The downside is it is so terribly hard to assemble. If you need to remove links to make it fit your wrist so it doesn’t fall off prepare to spend over an hour trying to complete this task. The directions are not that helpful. You have to affix the watch in between the black tool to keep it steady. Then use the screw driver in the black tool to take out a very tiny screw from one side. Then use the other screwdriver to take out the long pin screw from the other side. Easier said than done. And if you have long nails be prepared to try not to get frustrated and give up all together. I recommend using the box it came in to hold the screws because once they come out they are virtually impossible to see on anything that’s not a white background. I took out three links and finally got it reassembled only to see I need to remove another link to get it snug on my wrist like I like to wear watches. That said it was so difficult doing the first three links, I may opt to leave it like it is and push it further down my wrist where it’s wider to get it to fit snug. Honestly if it wasn’t so pretty I would’ve returned it because it’s so difficult to assemble. But once it’s on your wrist it’s a show stopper bound to get lots of compliments. And thankfully the battery installed was working well because that’ll be another feat to replace when the time comes.

评论概述: Pretty but not easy to adjust
评论详情: I read over 30 reviews and was excited about this watch. Everyone was saying easy to adjust. It is not easy to adjust. Maybe for someone who is used to taking apart and putting together watches but for the first time user this took me entirely too long. The instructions only show how to take a piece off and not how to put back on. You would think “ just do the opposite” but it’s extremely stiff and the pieces are tightly pushed in it takes muscle and real finesse to get it. I stabbed myself with the small needle while trying to push one end out. Cute. But with the struggle, ehh.
